Abathur.name: Symbiote
Abathur.description: Spawn and attach a Symbiote to a target ally or Structure. While active, Abathur controls the Symbiote, gaining access to new Abilities. The Symbiote is able to gain XP from nearby enemy deaths.

Abathur.name: Toxic Nest
Abathur.description: Spawn a mine that becomes active after a short time. Deals 153 (+4% per level) damage and reveals the enemy for 4 seconds. Lasts 90 seconds.  Stores up to 3 charges.

Abathur.name: Evolve Monstrosity
Abathur.description: Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains 2% Health and 2% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 40 times.  The Monstrosity can be healed by Carapace and has the ability to Burrow to a visible location every 80 seconds.  Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows Abathur to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits.  This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on his Monstrosity.

Abathur.name: Ultimate Evolution
Abathur.description: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Spell Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.

Abathur.name: Locust Strain
Abathur.description: Spawns a Locust to attack down the nearest lane every 15 seconds. Locusts last for 16 seconds, have 316 (+4% per level) health and deal 46 (+4% per level) damage with each Basic Attack.

Abathur.name: Deep Tunnel
Abathur.description: Quickly tunnel to a visible location

AbathurSymbiote.name: Carapace
AbathurSymbiote.description: Shields the assisted ally for 150 (+4% per level). Allied Heroes are healed for 22 (+4% per level) Health per second while the Shield is active. Lasts for 6 seconds.

AbathurSymbiote.name: Stab
AbathurSymbiote.description: Shoots a spike towards target area that deals 119 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy it contacts.

AbathurSymbiote.name: Spike Burst
AbathurSymbiote.description: Deals 120 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

AbathurSymbiote.name: Deep Tunnel
AbathurSymbiote.description: Order your Evolved Monstrosity to quickly tunnel to a visible location

1.name: Pressurized Glands
1.description: Increases the range of Symbiote's Spike Burst by 25% and decreases the cooldown by 1 second.

1.name: Envenomed Nest
1.description: Toxic Nests deal 75% more damage over 3 seconds.

1.name: Reinforced Carapace
1.description: Increase the Shield amount of Carapace by 30%.

1.name: Survival Instincts
1.description: Increases Locust's Health by 100% and damage by 60%.

4.name: Adrenal Overload
4.description: Heroic Symbiote hosts gain 25% increased Attack Speed.

4.name: Needlespine
4.description: Increases the damage and range of Symbiote's Stab by 20%.

4.name: Prolific Dispersal
4.description: Increase the range of Toxic Nest by 30%, reduce its cooldown by 2 seconds, and add 2 additional charges.

7.name: Vile Nest
7.description: Toxic Nests Slow enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2.5 seconds.

7.name: Networked Carapace
7.description: Using Symbiote's Carapace also applies an untalented Carapace Shield to all nearby allied Heroes, Minions, and Mercenaries.

7.name: Calldown: MULE
7.description: Activate to calldown a Mule that repairs Structures, one at a time, near target point for 40 seconds, healing for 90 Health every 1 second.

10.name: Ultimate Evolution
10.description: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Spell Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.

10.name: Evolve Monstrosity
10.description: Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains 2% Health and 2% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 40 times.  The Monstrosity can be healed by Carapace and has the ability to Burrow to a visible location every 80 seconds.  Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows Abathur to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits.  This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on his Monstrosity.

13.name: Spatial Efficiency
13.description: Symbiote's Stab gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by .5 seconds.

13.name: Soma Transference
13.description: Symbiote's Spike Burst heals the host for 64 (+4% per level) Health per enemy Hero hit.

13.name: Bombard Strain
13.description: Locust's Basic Attacks become a long-range siege attack and their duration is increased by 75%.

16.name: Envenomed Spikes
16.description: Abathur's Symbiote's Spike Burst also Slows enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2 seconds.

16.name: Adrenaline Boost
16.description: Symbiote's Carapace increases the Movement Speed of the target by 40% for 3.5 seconds.

16.name: Volatile Mutation
16.description: Ultimate Evolution clones and Monstrosities deal 137 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies every 3 seconds and when they die. Enemy Heroes hit heal the clone or Monstrosity for 75% of the damage dealt.

16.name: Locust Brood
16.description: Activate to spawn 3 Locusts at a nearby location.

20.name: Evolutionary Link
20.description: Increase the duration of Ultimate Evolution by 50%.  As long as the Ultimate Evolution is alive, the original target of the clone gains a Shield equal to 25% of their maximum Health.  Refreshes every 5 seconds.

20.name: Evolution Complete
20.description: Increase Monstrosity's Basic Attack damage by 100%.

20.name: Hivemind
20.description: Symbiote creates an additional Symbiote on a nearby allied Hero.  This Symbiote mimics the commands of the first, but does half damage and Shielding.

20.name: Locust Nest
20.description: Activate to create a nest that periodically spawns Locusts. Only one Locust Nest can be active at a time.
